resources.string:
About Us
 
 Occupines is a residential property rental finder application specifically targeted at tenants who are in a look for rental homes in the different parts of Baguio City. Started as a project by University students, Occupines envisions to help with the ease of search for rental homes, provide utility on the go and help in the advertisement of rental spaces here in Baguio City with just a simple tap or press of a button on your mobile phone. At Occupines, we believe by creating our application we provide a quality and customer friendly tool for various Tenants to use here in the City of Pines.
 
 F.A.Q. (Frequently Asked Questions)
 
 Q: What does the application do?
 A: Occupines list rental spaces for tenants to look for, provides utility, and make it easier to find a rental home.
 
 Q: Which rental homes does the application list?
 A: Occupines list houses, apartments, and boarding houses.
 
 Q: Are payment transactions done within the Occupines application?
 A: No, payment transactions are done between the Landlord and the Tenant.
 
 Q: Is Occupines available for IoS?
 A: No, Occupines is exclusive only on Android.
 
 Q: Can I use Occupines outside of Baguio?
 A: No, Occupines is restricted to rental spaces here in Baguio City.
 
 Q: How do I list my property?
 A: By registering an account on the application and selecting the list property option.
 
 Q: Is the application free to use?
 A: Yes, the application is free to use for Tenants and Landlords in Baguio City.
